tool_description: Blogger is a blog-publishing service that allows multi-user blogs with time-stamped entries.
name: Blogger
title: Blogger

api_list.name: getBlogByUrl
api_list.description: Retrieves a blog by its url.

api_list.name: getBlogById
api_list.description: Retrieves a blog by its ID.

optional_parameters.name: maxPosts
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to retrieve along with the blog. When this parameter is not specified, no posts will be returned as part of the blog resource.

api_list.name: addPage
api_list.description: Add a page.

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: Page content

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Page title

optional_parameters.name: isDraft
optional_parameters.description: Is page draft or not

api_list.name: addPost
api_list.description: Add a post.

optional_parameters.name: fetchBody
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included.

optional_parameters.name: locationSpan
optional_parameters.description: Your location span

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: Page content

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Your location

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Page title

optional_parameters.name: locationName
optional_parameters.description: Your location name

optional_parameters.name: isDraft
optional_parameters.description: Is page draft or not

optional_parameters.name: fetchImages
optional_parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

optional_parameters.name: titleLink
optional_parameters.description: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

optional_parameters.name: labels
optional_parameters.description: Array of labels to search for

api_list.name: approvePostComment
api_list.description: Marks a comment as not spam.

api_list.name: deletePost
api_list.description: Deletes one post by post ID.

api_list.name: deletePostComment
api_list.description: Delete a comment by ID.

api_list.name: deleteSinglePage
api_list.description: Deletes one pages resource by its page ID.

api_list.name: fullPageUpdate
api_list.description: Update existing page partly with data you provide. All empty fields will be cleared

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: Page content

optional_parameters.name: publish
optional_parameters.description: Whether to publish page or not

optional_parameters.name: revert
optional_parameters.description: Whether to revert page or not

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Page title

api_list.name: fullPostUpdate
api_list.description: Updates a post with information provided, non-provided fields are removed

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Page title

optional_parameters.name: fetchImages
optional_parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

optional_parameters.name: locationName
optional_parameters.description: Your location name

optional_parameters.name: isDraft
optional_parameters.description: Is page draft or not

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: Page content

optional_parameters.name: locationSpan
optional_parameters.description: Your location span

optional_parameters.name: publish
optional_parameters.description: Whether to publish page or not

optional_parameters.name: fetchBody
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Your location

optional_parameters.name: maxComments
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: revert
optional_parameters.description: Whether to revert page or not

optional_parameters.name: titleLink
optional_parameters.description: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

optional_parameters.name: labels
optional_parameters.description: Array of labels to search for

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: getAccessToken

optional_parameters.name: redirectUrl
optional_parameters.description: Your redirect url

api_list.name: getBlogPageViews
api_list.description: Retrieve pageview stats for a Blog.

optional_parameters.name: range
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "30DAYS": Page view counts from the last thirty days. "7DAYS": Page view counts from the last seven days. "all": Total page view counts from all time.

api_list.name: getBlogUserInfo
api_list.description: Gets one blog and user info pair by blogId and userId.

optional_parameters.name: maxPosts
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to pull back with the blog.

api_list.name: getPostComment
api_list.description: Retrieves one comment resource by its commentId.

api_list.name: getSinglePage
api_list.description: Retrieves one pages resource by its page ID.

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

api_list.name: getSinglePostById
api_list.description: Retrieves one post by post ID.

optional_parameters.name: fetchBody
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included.

optional_parameters.name: maxComments
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: fetchImages
optional_parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

api_list.name: getSinglePostByPath
api_list.description: Retrieves one post by post path.

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

optional_parameters.name: maxComments
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

api_list.name: getUserInfo
api_list.description: Retrieves a user by user ID.

api_list.name: listBlogComments
api_list.description: Retrieves the comments for a blog, across all posts, possibly filtered.

optional_parameters.name: maxResults
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Earliest date of comment to fetch

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Latest date of comment to fetch

optional_parameters.name: fetchBodies
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: Continuation token if request is paged.

api_list.name: listBlogPages
api_list.description: Retrieves the list of pages for a blog.

optional_parameters.name: fetchBodies
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "draft": Draft (unpublished) Pages "live": Pages that are publicly visible

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

api_list.name: listPostComments
api_list.description: Retrieves the list of comments for a post.

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

optional_parameters.name: fetchBodies
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: Continuation token if request is paged.

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Earliest date of comment to fetch

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Latest date of comment to fetch

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "emptied": Comments that have had their content removed "live": Comments that are publicly visible "pending": Comments that are awaiting administrator approval "spam": Comments marked as spam by the administrator

optional_parameters.name: maxResults
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

api_list.name: listPostUserInfo
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of post and post user info pairs, possibly filtered. The post user info contains per-user information about the post, such as access rights, specific to the user.

optional_parameters.name: fetchBodies
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included.

optional_parameters.name: fetchImages
optional_parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Latest date of post to fetch

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: Continuation token if request is paged.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: Sort order applied to results.

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Earliest date of comment to fetch

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "draft": Draft posts "live": Published posts "scheduled": Posts that are scheduled to publish in future.

optional_parameters.name: maxResults
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

optional_parameters.name: labels
optional_parameters.description: Array of labels to search for

api_list.name: listPosts
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of posts.

optional_parameters.name: fetchBodies
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included.

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Latest date of post to fetch

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "draft": Draft posts "live": Published posts "scheduled": Posts that are scheduled to publish in future.

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Earliest date of comment to fetch

optional_parameters.name: fetchImages
optional_parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

optional_parameters.name: maxResults
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: Sort order applied to results.

optional_parameters.name: pageToken
optional_parameters.description: Continuation token if request is paged.

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

optional_parameters.name: labels
optional_parameters.description: Array of labels to search for

api_list.name: listUserBlogs
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of blogs.

optional_parameters.name: view
optional_parameters.description: Acceptable values are: "ADMIN": Admin level detail "AUTHOR": Author level detail "READER": Admin level detail

optional_parameters.name: fetchUserInfo
optional_parameters.description: Whether the response is a list of blogs with per-user information instead of just blogs.

api_list.name: markCommentAsSpam
api_list.description: Marks a comment as spam. This will set the status of the comment to spam, and hide it in the default comment rendering.

api_list.name: partPageUpdate
api_list.description: Update existing page partly only with data you provide

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: Page content

optional_parameters.name: publish
optional_parameters.description: Whether to publish page or not

optional_parameters.name: revert
optional_parameters.description: Whether to revert page or not

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Page title

api_list.name: partPostUpdate
api_list.description: Updates a post with information provided

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: Page content

optional_parameters.name: locationSpan
optional_parameters.description: Your location span

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Your location

optional_parameters.name: fetchBody
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included.

optional_parameters.name: isDraft
optional_parameters.description: Is page draft or not

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Page title

optional_parameters.name: locationName
optional_parameters.description: Your location name

optional_parameters.name: fetchImages
optional_parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

optional_parameters.name: publish
optional_parameters.description: Whether to publish page or not

optional_parameters.name: maxComments
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve as part of the the post resource. If this parameter is left unspecified, then no comments will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: revert
optional_parameters.description: Whether to revert page or not

optional_parameters.name: titleLink
optional_parameters.description: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

optional_parameters.name: labels
optional_parameters.description: Array of labels to search for

api_list.name: publishPost
api_list.description: Publish a draft post.

optional_parameters.name: publishDate
optional_parameters.description: The date and time to schedule the publishing of the Post.

api_list.name: removeCommentContent
api_list.description: Removes the content of a comment.

api_list.name: revertPost
api_list.description: Revert a published or scheduled post to draft state, which removes the post from the publicly viewable content.

api_list.name: searchPosts
api_list.description: Searches for a post that matches the given query terms.

optional_parameters.name: fetchBodies
optional_parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: The sort order applied to the search results.
